exceptions.tactic: intros K V c a Hex.
intros K' V c a Hex.
intros K' V' c a Hex.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hex was not found in the current environment.
The reference l was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hl was not found in the current environment.

original: intros K V c a Hex. destruct Hex as [l Hl]. exists (scal c l). apply (is_series_scal c a l Hl).
